ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to create the resource under.

ShortCodeSid.description: The SID of the ShortCode resource being added to the Service.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the ShortCode resource.
**capabilities**: An array of values that describe whether the number can receive calls or messages. Can be: `SMS` and `MMS`.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**service_sid**: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) the resource is associated with.
**short_code**: The [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) format of the short code.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the ShortCode resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the ShortCode resource.
